ygData.subject: Re: Lv4 and lv5
ygData.msgSnippet: I tend to think it s different by either race or class. I have a Dwarven Cleric that I play occasionally, and he stopped getting basic equipment at 4th. I also
ygData.messageBody:
I tend to think it's different by either race or class. I have a Dwarven Cleric that I play occasionally, and he stopped getting basic equipment at 4th. I also have a Dark Elf Necromancer that kept getting basic equipment until 5th.
Has anyone else noticed this?
---

_______________________________
Ozimandias
oziman@...

>does it matter?
>
>Lance
>

>matter
>>how many times you die you can lose experience to the point that knocks you
>>back to 4.
>
>I thought it was at level 4 when you don't get the basic weapons and food
>and lv 5 when
>you start losing exp.
>
>Azboklin the enchanter
